events.message: Received the candidate's application for the software engineer position via the company careers page.
Categorised the application under Engineering based on the candidate's experience in software development and devops.
Assigned a recruiter specialized in engineering recruitment to handle this candidate's application for further processing.
Conducted an initial phone screening to assess the candidate's background and confirm their interest in the software engineer role.
Candidate responded positively, confirming availability for the next round of interviews and expressing enthusiasm about the position.
Scheduled the technical interview with the engineering team to evaluate the candidate's software development skills and problem-solving abilities.
The candidate completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating strong knowledge in coding and system design.
Scheduled an HR interview to discuss cultural fit, work preferences, and compensation expectations with the candidate.
Held a positive HR interview where the candidate expressed alignment with company values and willingness to join the team.
Extended a formal offer to the candidate outlining salary, benefits, and role responsibilities for the software engineer position.
Received positive feedback from the candidate who appreciated the offer details and expressed intent to accept pending final review.
Candidate formally accepted the job offer, confirming their start date and eagerness to join the engineering team.
Initiated the onboarding process including account setup and introduction to development tools for the new software engineer.
Successfully closed the hiring process after the candidate completed all onboarding steps and joined the engineering team.
